
``mean_flex``
=================

mean_flex

Description
-----------

mean_flex

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   mean_flex(x, ...)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``x``
     - data to use
   * - ``...``
     - other arguments to pass
